org.apache.juneau.examples.rest

Class HelloWorldResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.HelloWorldResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasicRestConfig

    @Rest(title="Hello World",
      description="An example of the simplest-possible resource",
      path="/helloWorld")
 @HtmlDocConfig(aside={"<div style=\'max-width:400px\' class=\'text\'>","\t<p>This page shows a resource that simply response with a \'Hello world!\' message</p>","\t<p>The POJO serialized is a simple String.</p>","</div>"})
public class HelloWorldResource
extends Object
implements BasicRestConfig
    Sample REST resource that prints out a simple "Hello world!" message.

      • error

        public void error()
        Description copied from interface: BasicRestConfig
        [* /error] - Error occurred.

        Servlet chains will often automatically redirect to "/error" when any sort of error condition occurs (such as failed authentication) and will set appropriate response parameters (such as an WWW-Authenticate response header).

        These responses should be left as-is without any additional processing.

        Specified by:
        error in interface BasicRestConfig

      • getStats

        public RestContextStats getStats(RestRequest req)
        Description copied from interface: BasicRestConfig
        [GET /stats] - Timing statistics.

        Timing statistics for method invocations on this resource.

        Specified by:
        getStats in interface BasicRestConfig
        Parameters:
        req - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A collection of timing statistics for each annotated method on this resource.
